item.title: About Invariants
item.description: What is an invariant? Nobody wants to hear this question from a fellow CS student towards the end of the semester. If you still don’t fully grasp

item.title: Math_test
item.description: In this post we have an overview over simple, yet useful formulas Completing the square $$x^2 + bx + c = (x + \frac{b}{2})^2 - \frac{b^2}{4} + c$$ Quadratic formula Die Wurzeln von $$ax^2 + bx + c$$ sind $$\frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$$
